ResearchProjectDef.label: wax-powered lighting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to create wax from meat at cooking stations and construct wax-fueled candelabras and chandeliers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wood stove furnace
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build wood-fueled stove furnaces to heat rooms and cook meals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mine-shafts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build deep resource mining shafts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: carbon arc lamps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use a simple voltage ignition system to create voltaic lights.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gas-powered lights
ResearchProjectDef.description: Generate and use gas to maintain simple light fixtures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: telegraph
ResearchProjectDef.description: Decode the mysteries of telecommunication. The telegraph allows contact with other communities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: weaponized electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to use electricity as a weapon. Unlocks slow but powerful arc weapons that can outperform mechanoids and stun enemies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tungsten-filament lamps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the crafting of electric lamps with tungsten-filaments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: record player
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft gramophones, antique music playing devices.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric refrigeration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build electric refrigerators to store meals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic radio
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct basic radio systems that double as basic communication points.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arc tower patent
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build Arc Towers which electrocute and stun enemies. Build at the machining table.

researchProjectDef.label: Rustika Furniture
researchProjectDef.description: One of your colonists found an old data-stick full of ancient E-Magazines. Among the salvageable data is a RIMkea Magazine, issue #3522. This issue was a special edition portraying various "tribal" furniture styles from asorted Rimworlds.

researchProjectDef.label: Millenium Line Furniture
researchProjectDef.description: One of your colonists found an old data-stick full of ancient E-Magazines. Among the salvageable data is a RIMkea Magazine, issue #4120. It introduced the "futuristic" RIMkea Millenium Line, and now you can build it too!
